mapper.select: select * from departments order by department_name
select * from jobs order by job_title

select last_name || ' ' || first_name name, j.job_title, d.department_name, e.* from employees e inner join jobs j on e.job_id = j.job_id left outer join departments d on d.department_id = e.department_id where employee_id = #{employee_id}

select e.employee_id, e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name as name, d.department_name, j.job_title, e.hire_date from employees e left outer join departments d on e.department_id=d.department_id inner join jobs j using(job_id)
where e.department_id is null
where e.department_id = #{department_id}
order by e.employee_id
